root.name: Gran Trak 10
root.description: Released by Atari in 1974, Gran Trak 10 was a single player racing game. It is basically a against the clock game, as players are given a time limit to complete a course, the less time they take the more points they get.The game also introduced a lot of features to arcades; the controls were a steering wheel, a gear shifter, an acceleration pedal as well as a brake pedal and it was one of the first arcade games to use ROM (Read-only Memory); it was used to save the score, timer, the race track and the car sprites.
